peft.py File Reference

Namespaces

 peft
 internal implementation used for scheduling a task DAG with any of the PEFT family of algorithms
 

Functions

def peft.schedule_dag (dag, computation_matrix=W0, communication_matrix=C0, proc_schedules=None, time_offset=0, relabel_nodes=True)
 Given an application DAG and a set of matrices specifying PE bandwidth and (task, pe) execution times, computes the PEFT schedule of that DAG onto that set of PEs. More...
 
def peft.readCsvToNumpyMatrix (csv_file)
 Given an input file consisting of a comma separated list of numeric values with a single header row and header column, this function reads that data into a numpy matrix and strips the top row and leftmost column. More...
 
def peft.readCsvToDict (csv_file)
 Given an input file consisting of a comma separated list of numeric values with a single header row and header column, this function reads that data into a dictionary with keys that are node numbers and values that are the CSV lists. More...
 
def peft.readDagMatrix (dag_file, show_dag=False)
 Given an input file consisting of a connectivity matrix, reads and parses it into a networkx Directional Graph (DiGraph) More...
 
def peft.generate_argparser ()
 For when this peft library is being invoked as a standalone commandline application, generate an argparser. More...
